overview: Gemini 3 Pro, Google’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out and will be available in GitHub Copilot Pro, Pro+ Business, and Enterprise subscriptions. Rollout will be gradual. Check back soon if you don’t see it yet.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Gemini 3 Pro, Google’s latest frontier model, is now rolling out and will be available in GitHub Copilot Pro, Pro+ Business, and Enterprise subscriptions. Rollout will be gradual. Check back soon if you don’t see it yet.
You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot Chat model picker from:
VS Code in Agent, Plan, Ask, and Edit mode

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable the Gemini 3 Pro policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see Gemini 3 Pro in supported surfaces.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Enable by selecting the model in the Visual Studio Code picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Select Manage Models from the picker, choose Gemini 3 Pro, and enter your API key when prompted.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Enable by selecting the model in the Visual Studio Code picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Select Manage Models from the picker, choose Gemini 3 Pro, and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more and share feedback
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation .
Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
